scripts.publish:infra: dotenv -e .env.local -e .env -- pnpm --filter web exec tsx scripts/publish-infra-artifacts.ts
scripts.clean:deep: pnpm run clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.docs:dev: cd mnky-docs && pnpm exec mint dev --port 3333
scripts.docs:validate: cd mnky-docs && pnpm exec mint validate
